entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
